item.title: Adding Amazon Bedrock Llama2 as an assistant in Ragna
item.description: Adding a new assistant in Ragna Following up from my previous post on Ragna, I wanted to share following the announcement of Meta’s Llama2 13b model availability within Amazon Bedrock, how you can incorporate that. I have also put together a GitHub repo that shares the code, something that I got quite a few questions from the original post. Adding Meta’s Llama2 As with adding Amazon Bedrock’s Anthropic’s Claude support, it was pretty straight forward to modify the original code to add support for Llama2.
